plugins.name: PropSelect
plugins.description:
PropSelect enhances your Figma workflow by allowing you to copy and paste specific properties like fill, stroke, and corner radius between elements without overwriting all properties.


Here is a YouTube video summarizing the features and working of this plugin - https://youtu.be/76v9z9xthH0


How it works:

1. Select an element: Click on an element in your design, and its properties will appear in the plugin UI.

2. Choose properties to copy: For each property (e.g., fill, stroke, corner radius), you can select a checkbox to indicate which properties you want to copy. Once you're done, click the copy button to save the selected properties.

3. Paste properties: You can paste the copied properties onto one or more elements at once.


Features:

• Selective property copying: Choose exactly which properties to copy (e.g., fill, stroke, corner radius) to avoid overwriting unwanted styles.

• Multi-object pasting: Apply copied properties to multiple objects simultaneously, saving time when working with multiple elements.

• Compatibility with other methods: You can paste properties copied outside of the plugin directly. Copying properties within plugin will not override that.

• Undo support: Easily undo your last action if something goes wrong.


Tips:

• Use PropSelect to quickly replicate specific properties across multiple objects without affecting other styles.

• Perfect for maintaining consistency in your design while only changing the properties you care about.

• Works well for batch edits where you want to adjust specific properties, like color or stroke width, across many elements.


Known issues:

• Does not copy underline properties or text alignment.

• Will not work on text boxes with different properties applied to individual contents.
plugins.tagline: Copy and paste specific properties of an element

137698.release_notes:
This version includes 2 major updates - 
1. Initially, on copying a property having a 'style' only the raw value of style was getting copied. Now, it will copy the style itself. E.g. on copying a element with fill style `Black`, the value of that style i.e. #000000 was getting copied which is now fixed to paste `Black` as fill style.
2. The stroke property initially did not capture stroke stroke direction (all sides/ top/ left/ custom, etc) and would apply it on all sides. Fixed

Please let me know if you find any bugs or have suggestions to improve.
137698.tagline: Copy and paste specific properties of an element

plugins.name: BulkGen
plugins.description:
BulkGen figma plugin saves you hundreds of hours of doing grunt work. If you're tasked with creating the same design, lots of time with just some data changing — don't wast time doing it manually. Just use bulkgen, it can auto populate your figma designs from a Google Sheet.


Features:

  1. Google Sheet Import: Make sure these are set to public.
  2. CSV Import: Works for local files


How it Works:

  1. Paste your Google Sheets URL
  2. Make sure the dynamic layers in Figma are labelled correctly (ex: firstname would be #firstname)
  3. Select a base template and hit generate, it's that easy.


Use Cases:

  1. Event Banners: Doing the same event in many cities? This will work for that
  2. Certificates: Automate 1000s of certificates in just a few clicks
  3. Wedding Invites: Mail Merge is so oldschool, just use this.
  4. And Many More.


Website: https://bulkgen.app

Help docs: https://ybnco.notion.site/BulkGen-Help-Docs-1905dc1b35f980f0becbe647dfae68d4

Email me: yb@yashbhardwaj.com

plugins.name: get-antd-token
plugins.description:
# get-antd-token - Ant Design Token 匹配工具


## 简介


get-antd-token 是一个专为设计师和开发者打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速匹配 Figma 设计元素与 Ant Design 的设计 Token，实现无缝的设计与开发协作。


## 主要功能


- 🎨 **精准颜色匹配**：选择任意元素，即时获取对应的 Ant Design 颜色 Token

- 💧 **半透明颜色识别**：智能识别半透明颜色，并提供 `rgba(token.colorXXX, 0.x)` 格式的替代方案

- 🔍 **边框与内边距识别**：自动检测元素的圆角和内边距，匹配相应的 borderRadius 和 padding Token

- 📝 **模板管理系统**：支持导入/导出 Token 模板，完全兼容 Ant Design 的主题配置文件

- 🔄 **一键复制**：快速复制 Token 值，轻松粘贴到代码中


## 插件优势


- **提高设计开发效率**：不再需要手动查找颜色代码或测量边距

- **保持设计一致性**：确保使用 Ant Design 官方推荐的 Token

- **简化设计交接**：设计师可以直接提供 Token 名称而非色值

- **支持主题切换**：通过模板管理轻松在不同主题间切换
plugins.tagline: 支持选中figma的元素获取到antd主题色对应的token值

plugins.name: Condens
plugins.description:
With the Condens plugin, you can quickly import highlights from Condens into FigJam. This keeps your insights intact, preserving key details like participant names and links back to the original data.


Perfect for brainstorming, organizing ideas, and running synthesis workshops with your team — without losing the context behind your research, even when switching between tools.


How it works:

  1. Export your highlights from Condens as a CSV file.
  2. Open the Condens plugin in FigJam and upload the CSV file.
  3. Your Highlights are instantly converted into sticky notes, complete with the respondent’s name and a direct link back to the original data in Condens, ready to use in your FigJam board.


Contact us for support, book a demo to get a personalized walkthrough, or visit our Help Center for more information.

If you're not using Condens yet, start your free 15-day trial at condens.io.

plugins.name: Tazym
plugins.description:
Introducing Tazym, the ultimate Figma plugin that streamlines the design-to-web process. With Tazym, you can effortlessly upload your designs to the cloud, generating a unique URL that allows you to update your design in Figma in real-time. Say goodbye to manual website updates or the need to rely on developers. With Tazym, you are the creator, and you own your designs.


Getting started with Tazym is easy. Simply select your design, name it, choose a format (SVG, PNG, or JPG), and voila - you have a URL that can be used anywhere to showcase your work. When inspiration strikes and you want to make updates, it's as easy as editing in Figma and hitting the Update button in Tazym. Your users will see your latest creations instantly.


Ready to take control of your designs and streamline your workflow? Visit tazym.com to learn more and start using Tazym today!

plugins.name: Smart Rename
plugins.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasks—all in a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

plugins.name: Lighthouse
plugins.description:
Lighthouse helps designers check Lottie animation compatibility across iOS, Android, and Web. It scans Figma frames, detects unsupported features like shadows, blurs, etc., and lists issues directly on affected layers. Double-click to jump to problem layers and get instant updates as you fix them—ensuring a smooth animation workflow.


How to Use Lighthouse:

1️⃣ Select a Frame – Open Lighthouse and choose a frame to analyze.

2️⃣ Instant Issue Detection – View a list of unsupported animation features.

3️⃣ Quick Fix Navigation – Double-click an issue to select the affected layer.

4️⃣ Live Updates – Changes update instantly as you fix issues.

5️⃣ Final Check & Export – Ensure compatibility for seamless Lottie animations.

6️⃣ Mark frames – Mark frames that are ready for animation to avoid confusion and ensure efficient workflow.


Simplify your motion design process with Lighthouse! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Instantly detect unsupported Lottie features in Figma for seamless cross-platform animations.

plugins.name: EasyMemo
plugins.description:
EasyMemo is a versatile plugin for creating, editing, and managing text memos within Figma. With EasyMemo, you can easily add colorful sticky notes, shapes with text, and simple text nodes to your canvas, helping to keep your workspace organized.


Key Features:


Memo Creation and Editing: Simply enter your text, select your desired memo type, and create memos effortlessly. You can edit memos directly on the canvas, and updates are reflected in real-time.

Customizable Colors: Choose colors from a preset color palette, allowing you to categorize and prioritize memos. The text color automatically adjusts for optimal readability based on the selected background color.

Easy Management:


Organize Memos in a List: Add memos to a list for better organization. You can update or delete memo texts directly from the list. The list is scrollable and always up-to-date.

Batch Generation: Easily generate all listed memos at once. Just click the "Create Shapes" button, and all memos will be neatly arranged on the canvas.

Efficient Layout: Memos are generated in the center of the viewport, focusing on the most relevant areas. They are neatly arranged to avoid overlap.

User-Friendly Interface: The modern and intuitive design features a clearly laid-out text input area, radio buttons for selecting memo types, a color palette, and a dynamically updating list.

How to Use:


Enter Text: Input your memo content in the text input area.

Select Memo Type: Choose from shapes with text, simple text, or sticky notes using the radio buttons.

Pick a Color: Select a color from the palette to categorize your memos. The selected color applies to the memo background, and the text color adjusts automatically.

Add to List: Press the Enter key to add the memo to the list. You can edit or delete memos directly within the list.

Generate Memos: Click the "Create Shapes" button to generate all memos on the canvas at once. Memos are centered in the viewport and neatly arranged.

EasyMemo is the perfect tool for organizing ideas and feedback within your Figma projects. Whether brainstorming, planning, or collaborating, EasyMemo simplifies memo management and supports you efficiently.
plugins.tagline: メモやテキストをEnterキー押下のみでリスト化して一括でShape,テキスト、Stickyを生成するプラグインです

plugins.name: Selemander Edit
plugins.description:
This plug-in provides useful functions such as reordering multi-selected items, enlarging and shrinking selections, automatically selecting items by name, deleting, and flipping the order.

이 플러그인은 선택한 여러 항목의 순서 변경, 선택 확대 및 축소, 이름을 통한 항목 자동 선택, 삭제, 순서 뒤집기 등 유용한 기능을 제공합니다.


### Short cut (If the plug-in window is enabled) ###

### 단축키 (플러그인 포커스 상태에서 동작) ###

  1. [Shift + Enter]: Enter the entered text into the selected text items. / 입력된 텍스트로 선택된 텍스트 항목에 입력
  2. [.] : Select the next item / 다음 항목 선택
  3. [,] : Select previous item / 이전 항목 선택
  4. [Shift + .]: Expand your selection to the previous item / 이전 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  5. [Shift + ,]: Expand your selection to the next item / 다음 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  6. [Left Arrow ←] : Move the selected items to the left / 선택된 항목들을 이전으로 이동
  7. [Right Arrow →] : Move the selected items to the right / 선택된 항목들을 다음으로 이동
  8. [Home] : Move to First / 첫번째 항목 선택
  9. [End] : Move to Last / 마지막 항목 선택
  10. [Delete, Backspace] : Delete selected items / 선택 항목들 삭제
  11. [Shift + s] : Swap between two texts / 선택된 두 텍스트 항목의 내용 바꾸기
  12. [Shift + r] : Reverse the selected items / 선택 항목의 순서를 뒤집기
  13. [-] : Unselect the last of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 마지막 항목을 선택 제거
  14. [Shift + -] : Unselect the first of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 첫번째 항목을 선택 제거
  15. [Shift + 1] : Select odd number items / 홀수 항목을 선택
  16. [Shift + 2] : Select even number items / 짝수 항목을 선택
plugins.tagline: Multi Selection & text controler for autolayout

plugins.name: strings_repository
plugins.description:
Simple plugin to synchronise translations with strings repository. Allows to push and pull translations from your own server. Works with active selection to speedup parsing processes.


Usage:

Enter connection details and press connect button.

After selection of element press "refresh selection" to get text labels from selection.

Press "pull" to fetch translations from remote server.

Press "apply" to apply translations from selected translations to document selection.

Press "push" to send translations to remote server.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize your translations

plugins.name: Voice to Text for Figma
plugins.description:
Easily insert text into Figma using your voice!

Click “Open Voice Tool” → Start speaking in the browser → Your speech will be transcribed and automagically added into your selected Figma text layer.

No typing. Just talking.


✅ Use Case 1:

“Tired of switching between docs and Figma just to copy-paste written content?”

Speak directly into the plugin’s voice tool and instantly push the transcription into your selected text box—no tab switching, no distractions.


✅ Use Case 2:

“Want to insert longer text into your Figma design without typing it all out?”

Use Voice to Text for Figma to dictate your content and have it transcribed directly into your design—perfect for mockups, user flows, or note-taking during brainstorming.


Supported Features & Limits:

✅ Languages Supported: English, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Dutch, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish

🕐 Time Limit: Records up to 60 seconds per session, auto-warns you before timeout

🌐 Browser Compatibility:

✅ Supported: Google Chrome, Safari, Opera, Samsung Internet

⚠️ Partially Supported: Microsoft Edge, Firefox

❌ Not Supported: Internet Explorer, Brave, Arc

🧠 Auto-restart: On silence to ensure smoother capture

🎙 Microphone Permission : Detects and guidance for Mac & Windows users.

🖥️ Figma Compatibility: Works seamlessly on both Figma Browser and Figma Desktop / Mac App

✅ Accessibility Enhancements

❤️ Open Source Code: https://github.com/mryeshwanth/voice-figma-plugin


How it works:

  1. When you click Open Voice Tool, a new browser window will open to start recording.
  2. This is required because Figma Mac/Desktop plugins can’t access your microphone directly.
  3. The tool uses your browser's built-in Web Speech API (SpeechRecognition) to transcribe your voice locally — nothing is sent to any external server.
  4. Once done, the transcription is securely sent back to the Figma plugin and inserted into your selected text node.
plugins.tagline: Convert your voice to text, directly into Figma.

plugins.name: Class Action
plugins.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.
plugins.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to communicate with the Lemon Squeezy API for license validation and activation.

136903.release_notes:
This update introduces powerful new control features and interface improvements that provide more precise management over how styles are applied to your Figma elements. The plugin now offers granular property selection and enhanced user experience consistency throughout the interface.

New in this release:
• Selective Property Application System: Choose exactly which properties to apply from saved classes with granular category control (Dimensions, Layout, Appearance, Fills, Strokes, Effects, Variables, Grids, Position)
• Persistent Property Preferences: Class-specific scope settings are remembered and indicated with visual markers for streamlined workflows
• Enhanced CSS Property Display: ClassDetails modal now shows only valid CSS properties, filtering out Figma-specific attributes for cleaner code reference
• Standardized Interface Components: Unified text styling across all modal dialogs for improved visual consistency
• Updated Promotional Pricing: Summer special offer with 50% discount (€4.50/year instead of €9/year) using code Y0NTY0NA
• Improved Import/Export Compatibility: Enhanced data format support ensures seamless class sharing across different plugin versions

These enhancements provide more control over style application while maintaining the plugin's focus on efficiency and precision. The selective application system addresses user requests for more granular control without compromising the streamlined workflow that makes Class Action effective for rapid Figma design iterations.
136903.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

  3. Watch the transformation – PixelTweak goes to work, smoothing out edges, rounding numbers, and aligning everything for a sleek, professional finish. It doesn’t just stop at the selected layers—it fine-tunes every child element for complete perfection.

plugins.name: Selemander Curreny
plugins.description:
You can convert the selected numbers into currency units by country.

You can search for the currency you want to convert by searching by country name or currency code, or you can extract only numbers.

Only currency symbols and codes can be added separately,

You can also convert the Korean number to a Korean number unit or convert the Korean number back to an Arabic number.

You can enter only by collecting currency symbols.


선택된 숫자들을 국가별 통화 단위로 변환할 수 있습니다.

국가명이나 통화 코드 등으로 검색하여 변환하고 싶은 통화를 검색할 수 있으며, 숫자만 추출할 수도 있습니다.

통화 심볼, 코드만 따로 추가 할 수 있으며,

한국 숫자 단위로 변환하거나 한국 숫자를 아라비아 숫자로 다시 변환 할 수도 있습니다.

통화 심볼만 모아 보면서 입력할 수 있습니다.
plugins.tagline: Converting numbers into currency units by country and adding currency symbols, codes, etc.

plugins.name: Grid Counter
plugins.description: Grid Counter calculates how many grid columns or rows a selected element spans within its parent frame. To use, simply select an element inside a frame with a layout grid, and the plugin will display the number of columns or rows it spans. It updates in real-time as you select different elements. You can also adjust the grid columns with a click of a button.

accepted.name: Jean Candelier
accepted.description: Front End Web Developer. Former Figma employee.

plugins.tagline: Instantly measure grid spans for any selected element.

plugins.name: LARA
plugins.description:
LARA® For Figma provides access to an auto-generated searchable library of your approved promotional material that automatically identifies claims.

Keep historical brand knowledge in one place to easily find exactly the language you're looking for.

LARA® can be seamlessly updated as you get new content approved, cutting out the need to manually update a catalog.

Keep your data safe and secure in the cloud instead of in someone's head or filing cabinet.


*Subscription is required to log into the plug-in. Please contact the Lithero team for more information at https://lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Search your auto-generated library of approved promotional material generated by LARA®.

plugins.name: Pictomate Icons
plugins.description:
Precise, elegant, and consistent icons for designers


Pictomate is a Figma plugin that offers a carefully crafted set of SVG icons — designed for real products, design systems, and teams that care about clarity and consistency.


• Smart search

• Production-ready quality

• Distraction-free workflow


Whether you're building onboarding flows, dashboards, or pricing pages, these icons are made to just work - without visual noise or clutter.


New icon sets and improvements are on the way. Feel free to share feedback or suggestions!


For any questions or custom licensing needs, feel free to reach out: hello@pictomate.com


Created and maintained by Dominik Pacholczyk
plugins.tagline: Icons for designers who care. Precise, consistent, elegant.

plugins.name: Image Generator with Component & Google Spreadsheet
plugins.description:
A powerful plugin that automatically generates Figma component-based images using data from Google Spreadsheets. Save time on projects requiring large volumes of design assets. Simply input your data into a spreadsheet, select your desired component templates, and generate hundreds of images with just one click. Streamline your design workflow by automating repetitive design tasks such as banners, social media posts, product catalogs, and more.


Google 스프레드시트의 데이터를 활용하여 Figma 컴포넌트 기반 이미지를 자동으로 생성하는 강력한 플러그인입니다. 대량의 디자인 에셋이 필요한 프로젝트에서 시간을 절약하세요. 스프레드시트에 데이터를 입력하고, 원하는 컴포넌트 템플릿을 선택한 다음, 버튼 한 번으로 수백 개의 이미지를 생성할 수 있습니다. 배너, 소셜 미디어 포스트, 제품 카탈로그 등 반복적인 디자인 작업을 자동화하여 디자인 워크플로우를 혁신하세요.
plugins.tagline: Generate images from your Google Sheets with powerful component integration

plugins.name: Figma to Azure
plugins.description:
Crete Azure work items without leaving Figma.


Key Features

  1. One-Click Creation: Select any Figma component to generate an Azure Board item.
  2. Automatic Previews: Visuals attach directly to the work item.
  3. Direct Linking: Clickable links between Azure work items and components.
  4. Custom Field Mapping: Match your Azure setup with flexible field configs.
  5. Team Area Support: Organize work in your project’s structure.
  6. Smart Field Detection: Autofills required Azure fields.


Why Teams Use It

  1. Save time—no more screenshots or copy-paste.
  2. Developers get full visual context.
  3. Sync design and dev workflows effortlessly.
  4. Keep everything traceable and connected.


How to Get Started

  1. Select a Figma component
  2. Add your Azure Personal Access Token (requires Read & Write access for work items)
  3. Enter your Azure DevOps URL
  4. Customize the item
  5. Click Create


That’s it—the plugin handles previews, links, and field setup for you.
plugins.tagline: Crete Azure work items without leaving Figma

plugins.name: Screen Description
plugins.description:
INSTALL GUIDE & PLAYGROUND TRYOUT PLUGIN

インストールガイド＆プレイグラウンド試用プラグイン


Screen Description is your ultimate design companion. Effortlessly craft compelling descriptions for any design project, from logos to complex UI guidelines. Choose from a variety of writing styles inspired by top designers and easily switch between languages. Perfect for designers, developers, and anyone who needs to articulate their design vision.

Screen Descriptionは、あなたの究極のデザインパートナーです。ロゴから複雑なUIガイドラインまで、あらゆるデザインプロジェクトのために、説得力のある説明を簡単に作成できます。トップデザイナーに触発された多様なライティングスタイルから選択し、言語を簡単に切り替えることができます。デザイナー、開発者、そしてデザインビジョンを明確にしたいすべての人に最適です。


Our tool offers:

私たちのツールは以下を提供します。


Customizable styles: Choose from a range of writing styles to match your unique voice.

Multilingual support: Describe your designs in any language.

Comprehensive coverage: From logos to complex UI guidelines, we've got you.

カスタマイズ可能なスタイル：あなたのユニークな声に合わせた多様なライティングスタイルから選択できます。

多言語サポート：あらゆる言語でデザインを説明できます。

包括的なカバー範囲：ロゴから複雑なUIガイドラインまで、すべてに対応します。


Don't forget to give ❤️ If you like it, each ❤️ you give are our motivation for new plugin and productivity
